verses.verse: Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Go <S%H1980><s%> yet, <S%H5750><s%> love <S%H157><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> beloved <S%H157><s%> of her friend, <S%H7453><s%> yet an adulteress, <S%H5003><s%> according to the love <S%H160><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> toward <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> look <S%H6437><s%> to <S%H413><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods, <S%H430><s%> and love <S%H157><s%> flagons <S%H809><s%> of wine. <S%H6025><s%>

So I bought <S%H3739><s%> her to me for fifteen <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> pieces of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and for a homer <S%H2563><s%> of barley, <S%H8184><s%> and a half homer <S%H3963><s%> of barley: <S%H8184><s%>

And I said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, Thou shalt abide <S%H3427><s%> for me many <S%H7227><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> play the harlot, <S%H2181><s%> and thou shalt not <S%H3808><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> for another man: <S%H376><s%> so will I <S%H589><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> be for <S%H413><s%> thee.

For <S%H3588><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall abide <S%H3427><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> without <S%H369><s%> a king, <S%H4428><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> a prince, <S%H8269><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> a sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> an image, <S%H4676><s%> and without <S%H369><s%> an ephod, <S%H646><s%> and without teraphim: <S%H8655><s%>

Afterward <S%H310><s%> shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> return, <S%H7725><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and David <S%H1732><s%> their king; <S%H4428><s%> and shall fear <S%H6342><s%> <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and his goodness <S%H2898><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
